There is a dominance check card on the board?
If Wakhan is able to purchase the Dominance Check and score the most victory points and/or win the game, she will use her action to do that, regardless of the actions listed on her AI card.
If there are specific instructions: Follow them. Ties are decided by the cheapest card in the market with the highest card number breaking any further ties.

Wakhan only purchases a Dominance Check event card if she will score the most points from the check (and/or wins). However, when a Dominance Check is in the market, Wakhan will choose the cheapest Patriot loyal to the dominant coalition, then the cheapest card with the most Army and/or Road impact icons, or, if no coalition is dominant, she will chose the cheapest card with the most spy and/or tribe impact icons. If there is a tie, use the highest card number.
